text: geudeul-eul salhaehan geos-eun neohuiga anila hananimkkeseo geudeul-eul myeolmang ke hayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-ege deonjin geos-eun geudaega anila hananimkkeseo deonjisyeoss eum-ila ineun hullyunghan siheom-eulo mid neun jadeul-ege eunheleul bepulgoja ham ini sillo hananim-eun deul-eusimgwa a sim-eulo chungmanhasim-ila
